reviewText: The best thing to learn sign from

This was my one big ooh-ah for Christmas a couple years ago.  I'm still working on it--currently, I'm about two-thirds through Mosiah--and I feel like this is really helping with my receptive skills which are pretty lousy.  I LOVE seeing the way Minnie Mae signs certain parts like the vision of the Tree of Life and the Allegory of the Olive Trees.  HOWEVER--if you are thinking of buying this, go to the source.  It only cost me $2.50 for a brand new set.
[...]

Exactly what I ordered and wanted...great service.
Come on...pros don't make you go on with complement...Let's face it. You folks are pros!

I put the dvd in , i saw no caption , no discription
except for the scripture . it was all in asl , no interpretation , esepecially if your just begining its hard to grasp it . you have to read the verse or chapter before you begin . thats what i didn't expect !  however it was neat and a great tool .
